docs.text:
About




“If the path before you is clear, you’re probably on someone else’s.”
― C.G. Jung




Strategic delivery consultant who works with ambitious teams to improve the quality of their delivery and processes. A veteran Solutions Architect from Microsoft with a passions for IT Enabled Business change.


Straight-talking and passionate about Software.


Architect


The Science and Art of creating Software that matters.


Curious




“I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.”
― Albert Einstein




Creative




“Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.”
― Albert Einstein




Deliver




“You are what you do, not what you say you'll do.” 
― C.G. Jung
